DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Europe. This trial aims for a comparison of the effect on glycemic control in subjects with type 2 diabetes of three different premixed insulin analogues given in combination with an oral anti-diabetic drug.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Biphasic Insulin Aspart 70/30, 50/50, and 30/70 in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes Currently treated with insulin Currently treated with Metformin HbA1c: 7.512.0% Body Mass Index (BMI) < 25.0 or > 40.0 kg/m2 Metformin contraindications according to local practice TZDs within 6 months prior to randomisation
